all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Hearken ye to these words. Behold, I am Jesus Christ, the Savior of the world. Treasure these things up in your hearts, and let the solemnities of eternity rest upon your minds.
Doctrine and Covenants 43:34
Quote of the Day
"You might question whether you know the Savior’s doctrine well enough to teach it effectively. … Don’t give in to those doubts. Turn to God for help."
Henry B. Eyring | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
